strong.span:
Welcome to the Dodgeville School District,
where our mission is:

p.span: Dodgeville School District, a catalyst for excellence, will ensure our children are caring, responsible, capable, self-assured world citizens, by creating a child-centered environment that is inclusive, integrated, individualized and inspiring.

a.title: DSD Donates 3D Printed Masks to Hospital

div.div: DSD Donates 3D Printed Masks to Hospital
DMS & DHS Tech Ed Teacher donates 20 3D printed filter systems used for Bag Valve Masks to Upland Hills Health.
Read More About DSD Donates 3D Printed Masks to Hospital

a.title: Ryan Bohnsack named DHS's New Principal

div.div: Ryan Bohnsack named DHS's New Principal
Dodgeville School District is excited to announce that our current Assistant Principal, Ryan Bohnsack, was named Dodgeville High School’s new Principal at Tuesday evening’s School Board Meeting!
Read More About Ryan Bohnsack named DHS's New Principal
Dodgeville School District is excited to announce and welcome Paul Weber as our new Superintendent!
Read More About DSD Announces New Superintendent
